content: beach coverup or lightweight summer sweater you decide you ll begin by crocheting two identical granny hexagons which will form the shoulders and chest area of your garment then you ll tailor this piece to fit your unique body by following the customization notes provided in the pattern the dune drifter is an excellent choice if you re new to making clothing because you can try it on as you go skills you ll practice include double crocheting in the round and row meeting the pattern gauge changing colors and reverse single_crochet this ad-free pdf is formatted for easy printing and mobile viewing it contains everything you need for a successful project including - a written pattern in 8 adult sizes including plus sizes - links to relevant video tutorials - photo tutorials - printable labels for your hexagon sides - a stitch chart and additional visual diagrams find more of our easy free crochet hexagon sweater patterns 1 here 1 https //makeanddocrew com/crochet-hexagon-cardigans/
